caption.center: BRUCE H. GROVE, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.850 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Flagler County, Raul A. Zambrano, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Mary Elizabeth Fitzgibbons, of Fitzgibbons Law Firm, P.A., Kissimmee, for Appellant.
Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Carmen F. Corrente, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
GRIFFIN, EVANDER and COHEN, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED DISPOSED OF.Page 25
